readable.title: 3245250964_9d3e37111e
readable.content: A basketball player jumps for a shot while another attempts to block him . Man in blue and white uniform shooting basketball being blocked by man in white and red . Two basketball players oppose each other at the net . Two men are playing basketball and one is trying to block the other . Two men , one with a ball and a blue uniform , and the other in a white uniform are playing basketball .
